text:
[Verse]
Moonlight whispers soft
Round and round we fly
Colors blend and drift
Underneath the sky

[Verse 2]
Horses made of dreams
Spinning through the night
Laughter floats like beams
In this glowing light

[Chorus]
Ride the starlit carousel
Magic spins us all so well
Round and round we never fell
In the night we cast our spell

[Verse 3]
Lights flicker like stars
Glowing in our eyes
Music from afar
Harmony that ties

[Verse 4]
Miracles unfold
As we hold on tight
Stories yet untold
In the wheels of light

[Bridge]
Time can never steal
Moments that we feel
On this carousel
Underneath the spell
title: Starlit Carousel
